text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno evaṃ vadeyya na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī ti pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno evaṃ vadeyya na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī ti pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 71. Should any bhikkhu, admonished by the bhikkhus in accordance with a rule, say, "Friends, I will not train myself under this training rule until I have put questions about it to another bhikkhu, competent and learned in the discipline," it is to be confessed.
๗๑. ภิกษุใด อันภิกษุทั้งหลายว่ากล่าวอยู่โดยชอบธรรม กล่าวอย่างนี้ว่า “แน่ะเธอ ฉันจะยังไม่ศึกษาในสิกขาบทนี้กว่าจะได้ถามภิกษุอื่นผู้ฉลาดผู้ทรงวินัย” เป็นปาจิตตีย์

71. Should any bhikkhu, being admonished according to Dhamma by bhikkhus (about a training-rule), say thus, "Friends, I shall not observe this training-rule until I can ask some other bhikkhu who is a learned expert in the Vinaya about it," it entails expiation.
